mapper.insert: insert into station (StationID, StationName, ProvinceID, CityID, AdminID, StationPhone, StationSite, StationNotes) values (#{stationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationnotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update station set StationName = #{stationname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProvinceID = #{provinceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CityID = #{cityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AdminID = #{adminid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, StationPhone = #{stationphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, StationSite = #{stationsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, StationNotes = #{stationnotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where StationID = #{stationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select StationID, StationName, ProvinceID, CityID, AdminID, StationPhone, StationSite, StationNotes from station where StationID = #{stationid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select StationID, StationName, ProvinceID, CityID, AdminID, StationPhone, StationSite, StationNotes from station
